basics.name: Maxim Marshak
basics.label: Sociopathic cat lover. OSINT activities & Investigations | DevOps | Python | Node.js | Perl | Bash. Sometimes hiring in IT. Twitter: @HiddenDjoker
basics.summary:
I develop and investigate on Python, Node.js, Perl, Bash with OSINT, Cybesecurity & DevOps activities and practices. Sometimes I hire targeted for positions in the IT level from middle+, with relocation outside Russia, write about hiring in IT, HR Tech, development and participate in various professional communities.

I do not consider offers from russian corporations, state structures, and office work within Russian Federation. Now I leave Russia.

My soft skills and communications:

- Strong skills in hiring specialists in various career areas, mainly IT. Extensive experience in hiring and relocating specialists from Russia, all kinds of communications 
- Experience in searching for people, facts from various sources, in social networks monitoring and promoting communities, including closed ones 
- Interest in the application of OSINT techniques, research and investigations. Experience in automating, developing and configuring solutions for managing ATS and some databases with data about people and some artifacts to research it

My technical stack:

- Python, Node.js, JavaScript, Perl, Bash
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySql, Redis, Django, Celery, RabbitMQ
- AWS (EC2, Amplify, S3, RDS, Route 53, DynamoDB), ClickHouse, Prometheus, Grafana, Zabbix, Huginn, Jira administration
- Linux (Ubuntu, Debian, Kali, Amazon Linux, Arch Linux, Parrot OS, Mikrotik OS, CentOS, FreeBSD), MacOS, Windows, Virtualization (VirtualBox, Vagrant, VMWare), Docker - at the level of normal, advanced in places, DevOps. I have a talent to install and configure any software so that it works on any systems and configurations
- Some frameworks & tools for highload, queuing, mutli threading, multi processing, sharding, etc. for building optimal technical solutions
- Selenium, Puppeteer, Apify, Playwright, Crawlee and at different times a bunch of all sorts of exotics, mainly integration, for parsing, scraping, crawling and data enrichment
- Various protocols related to e-mail (POP3, IMAP, MTU logs, verification and validation of addresses through various services, mass mailings)

See https://github.com/bormaxi8080 for details.

You can contact me on Twitter: @HiddenDjoker or Telegram: @bormaxi

See https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxim-marshak/details/featured/ for my OSINT, DevOps and Development tools collection.

work.name: Secret NDA Place
work.summary: I develop backends and various automations on Python, Node.js, Perl. I do some server logic, REST API, imports, exports, data parsing, scrapers, data enrichment and various other tricky things. Sometimes I am very targeted in hiring for IT companies (remote job and relocation outside Russia) and help in OSINT investigations and development of professional communities.

work.name: GoodJob Hiring Agency
work.summary: A small warm tube recruitment agency. Recruitment geography: Novosibirsk, remote location, relocation from the Russian Federation to Europe (I took more than 250 families outside the Russian Federation and friends gave me the nickname "Russian Schindler"). Hiring candidates in IT from the middle level. Automated candidate database of 50+ thousand people. I created my own community, for 6 years he has gained a lot of connections and insights among different companies at different times in the team from 1 to 6 recruiters.

work.name: Improve IT
work.summary: The best all-time IT company in Novosibirsk, mobile application development. Hiring employees, hiring employees, hiring employees. First he worked under a contract, then in the state. The company closed in 2021.

work.name: FIS
work.summary: Banking software company. Recruitment, work with internal HR processes, motivation, retention, HR strategy. Hired 100+ people in the company, implemented ATS. After leaving the operating activities of the company, I hired students for internships.

references.name: Dmitry Kozlov
references.reference: Maxim has strong OSINT-research skills, has many tools and techniques for collecting and analyzing data, and has problem-solving mindset.

references.name: Eugene Kropotkin
references.reference:
Maxim Marshak is an experienced and talented recruitment manager has a deep technical background. 
All my friends recognizes him for his friendly nature and HR skills. 
He is always open to listening to customers needs and never compromises his professionalism, integrity, and work ethic. 
Also his technical background allows him to be competent in details of skills checking

references.name: Vladimir Vinnikov
references.reference:
It's always a pleasure to work with Maxim. He puts his impressive set of hard skills to a good use. If provided with an architecture outline or a mathematical model or an algorithm, he will come with a decent software solution of an underlying problem.
Maxim is more than competent in a cybersecurity sphere. You can rely on him that it will be no situations with any data being compromised.

references.name: Oleg Nikitenko
references.reference: I know Maxim in Python/DevOps/Test Automation areas. He is a great specialist. He always opened for support, help, new areas learning. I may to recommend him always and everywhere. Have you a Good Luck, Max ..!

references.name: Yanina Yakovleva
references.reference:
Давно и с удовольствием слежу за креативными постами Максима. Душевный  Джокер 
стал необходимостью в наше непростое время.

references.name: Alisa Tebaeva
references.reference:
I know Max since 2018 when he used to administer one of the biggest communities for Russia's HR professionals in Facebook. It was the time when I started my own private practice in training and we often discussed with Max how to balance the needs of corporations and the desires for employees (and whether it is wherever possible) and what are key competencies for HR to be successful.

But our true friendship started in 2022, when I decided to leave Russia after the start of war. Just a few people were aware of it, and Max was really caring whether my plan is working out and was indeed happy when everything turned out successfully. It was also valuable as for many years Max was recruiting IT and other Tech specialists for foreign markets. 

Max, good luck in all your endeavours! You bring passion in everything that you are doing and this is truly inspiring.

references.name: Alina Runova
references.reference:
Maxim is an experienced and talented recruitment manager and Software developer. This great combination helps him to understand his candidate for 100% better than any other recruiters can do :)

Also, I found him a professional with great development experience and profound knowledge with a positive attitude
Any team would be lucky to have Maxim, and I couldn’t recommend him more for any business looking for new talent!

references.name: Evgeniy Vovney
references.reference: I recommend Maksim as a good specialist in IT recruitment, research, monitoring of social services and communications, who develops technical solutions in these areas.

references.name: Nika Kvasha
references.reference: I am very grateful to Max for his consultation about programming and HR. It helped me to build my strategy and move on with inspiration.

projects.name: linkedin2md
projects.summary: Project which illustrates a scheme for building a simple resume/profile database based on a minimalist approach and storing structured profile information in markdown format

projects.name: Huginn project private fork commits
projects.summary: Huginn is a system for building agents that perform automated tasks for you online. They can read the web, watch for events, and take actions on your behalf. Huginn's Agents create and consume events, propagating them along a directed graph. Think of it as a hackable version of IFTTT or Zapier on your own server. You always know who has your data. You do.

projects.name: RIP Leaks community project
projects.summary: RIP Leaks community project, publicly oppose the processes of Russian import substitution, including in the IT sector, and cover news on this topic

projects.name: OSINT Framework (http://osintframework.com) updates
projects.summary: OSINT framework focused on gathering information from free tools or resources. The intention is to help people find free OSINT resources. Some sites included might require registration or offer more data for $$$, but you should be able to get at least a portion of the available information for no cost.

projects.name: Telepathy project updates
projects.summary: Telepathy, an OSINT toolkit for scraping Telegram data to help investigate shady going on.

projects.name: ZnayTK Community Project
projects.summary: ZnayTK is a community project for HR managers on labor legislation in the Russia. Closed in 2021.
